job_history.work_description: Leading worldwide major manufacturer, distributor and retailer of high quality vitamins & supplements. Leadership role in the Vendor selection process (RFI/RFP/SOW). Negotiated and Contracted with selected technology vendors to optimize quality and minimize IT costs.
Researched, selected, implemented and managed multiple Vendor relationships. Lead several RFI, RFP, MSO and SOW's. Drafted and approved contract amendments/renewals.
Started a new Technology Support team, centrally supporting over 110+ Business Applications.
Provided professional consulting services to multiple Fortune 500 Companies in Investments, Banking, Finance and Insurance areas.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Held multiple leadership roles, including Senior Manager and Director positions, indicating expert-level mastery in leadership.

skills.name: Vendor Management
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in vendor selection, negotiation, and contract management, showing expert-level proficiency in vendor management.

skills.name: Contract Negotiation
skills.explanation: Successfully negotiated and contracted with multiple technology vendors, demonstrating expert-level mastery in contract negotiation.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Managed multiple projects, including RFI, RFP, MSO, and SOW, showing strong proficiency in project management.

skills.name: Business Systems
skills.explanation: Started a new Technology Support team and supported over 110+ Business Applications, indicating strong proficiency in business systems.

skills.name: Consulting
skills.explanation: Provided professional consulting services to multiple Fortune 500 Companies, showing strong proficiency in consulting.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Led and managed multiple teams, including a Technology Support team, indicating strong proficiency in team management.

skills.name: Business Administration
skills.explanation: Holds a Master's degree in Business Administration, showing a solid working proficiency in business administration.

skills.name: Management
skills.explanation: Holds a Bachelor's degree in Management and Economics, showing a solid working proficiency in management.
